hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Build dserver echo "================================ dserver ================================ dserver ================================ dserver ================================"
# alter trigger parameter
if [[ ! "`date +"%H%M"`" < "0000" && ! "`date +"%H%M"`" > "0800" ]]; then export TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY=brandnew fi
# export variables
export DSERVER_PATH=${WORKSPACE} export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/libweintek_${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}/workspace export MARIADB_CONNECTOR_C_PATH=/home/ci/work/mariadb-connector-c export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/build-${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}-branch export BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then export GOOGLE_BREAKPAD_PATH=/home/ci/work/cMT-SVR/google-breakpad fi
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT3000") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; "cMT-iv5") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT-iv5/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; esac
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5-3000") export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=cMT3000 ;; *) export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} ;; esac
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT3000") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.c30 ;; "cMT-SVR") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.cmt ;; "cMT-iv5") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.iv5 ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.c30 ;; esac
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "android-arm" ]; then export ANDROID_CMAKE_FILE=/home/ci/android-cmake/android.toolchain.cmake export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT=/home/ci/Android/Sdk export ANDROID_NDK_ROOT=/home/ci/Android/android-ndk export TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/android-arm/target/sysroots/android-toolchain-arm export CC=${TOOLCHAIN}/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc export CXX=${TOOLCHAIN}/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-g++ export INSTALL_PREFIX=${TOOLCHAIN}/sysroot/usr fi
# clear artifacts
rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver* rm -rf ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts mkdir ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts
# prepare out-of-source build
cd ${DSERVER_PATH}/build if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "brandnew" ]; then rm -rf jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} fi if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins fi if [ ! -d "jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} fi cd jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}
# generate makefile
${DSERVER_PATH}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/cmake_dserver.sh ${DSERVER_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${MARIADB_CONNECTOR_C_PATH} ${GOOGLE_BREAKPAD_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} ${BUILD_TYPE}
# make
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "clean" ]; then make clean fi make install VERBOSE=1 cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts/dserver.RelWithDebInfo
# strip
make install/strip VERBOSE=1 cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts/dserver.decrypted
# encrypt
if test -n "${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME}"; then /home/ci/work/crypto e ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts fi

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
:: alter trigger parameter
if "%time%" geq " 0:00:00.00" ( if "%time%" lss " 8:00:00.00" ( set TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY=clean ))
:: set variables
set WORKSPACE_DIR=%cd% set WORK_UTIL_DIR=c:\jenkins\work set LIBWEINTEK_DIR=C:\jenkins\workspace\libweintek_%TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP%\MATRIX_AXIS_NODE\windows\MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM\win32
:: clear artifacts
del %WORKSPACE_DIR%\build\vs2012\dserverRelease\dserver.* rmdir /s/q %WORKSPACE_DIR%\artifacts mkdir %WORKSPACE_DIR%\artifacts
:: prepare build environment
cd %WORKSPACE_DIR%\build\vs2012 copy /y %LIBWEINTEK_DIR%\build\vs2012\build_win32.bat . copy /y dserver.props.in dserver.props
call %WORK_UTIL_DIR%\script\replace_string.bat "dserver.props" "<WEINTEKDIR>..\..\..\libweintek</WEINTEKDIR>" "<WEINTEKDIR>%LIBWEINTEK_DIR%</WEINTEKDIR>"
:: build project
call build_win32.bat dserver Release %TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY% copy /y dserverRelease\dserver.exe %WORKSPACE_DIR%\artifacts copy /y dserverRelease\dserver.pdb %WORKSPACE_DIR%\artifacts
